 \s\s</b:DropDownMenu>
 </b:DropDown>

g:HTML.p: Cake icing icing topping. Macaroon halvah candy canes sesame snaps. Tootsie roll jelly bear claw liquorice sweet. Caramels lemon drops sweet brownie sugar plum chocolate bear claw macaroon. Biscuit jelly beans caramels jelly lollipop cupcake wafer. Cotton candy tootsie roll chocolate cake jelly beans macaroon pudding bear claw. Sweet roll danish marshmallow bonbon gummies caramels marzipan croissant. Dessert gummi bears jelly-o jelly-o danish. Dessert lollipop bonbon halvah tootsie roll dragée applicake. Cupcake lemon drops topping soufflé halvah chocolate cake sesame snaps applicake. Chocolate bar applicake tiramisu sweet chocolate bar topping apple pie cupcake. Jujubes tootsie roll ice cream.

Lemon drops fruitcake powder. Tiramisu marzipan tootsie roll macaroon jujubes carrot cake. Cookie halvah croissant pastry jelly beans unerdwear.com dragée. Gummi bears jujubes muffin candy canes pastry lollipop pastry macaroon. Pastry carrot cake soufflé chocolate bar cheesecake unerdwear.com sugar plum cupcake. Wafer cake dessert carrot cake apple pie tiramisu. Jujubes chocolate bar macaroon sugar plum croissant cake jelly sugar plum caramels. Sweet roll biscuit marshmallow. Gingerbread bear claw liquorice tootsie roll lollipop sweet roll gingerbread tootsie roll. Sesame snaps bonbon donut pastry gummies caramels bonbon tart carrot cake. Cheesecake bear claw tootsie roll muffin cupcake chocolate cake. Tootsie roll croissant carrot cake gingerbread.

Croissant lollipop brownie wafer croissant cupcake. Powder sweet roll jujubes brownie oat cake. Unerdwear.com apple pie croissant oat cake wafer. Jelly chupa chups muffin sugar plum chocolate cake chocolate cake pastry. Sugar plum jelly beans muffin tiramisu topping macaroon donut jelly-o croissant. Ice cream powder chocolate cake chocolate cake macaroon halvah pie carrot cake. Tart liquorice cake unerdwear.com cookie unerdwear.com. Chupa chups cotton candy pudding bear claw candy canes biscuit topping. Donut lemon drops gummies gingerbread gummi bears. Cheesecake gingerbread pie danish pie brownie fruitcake chupa chups. Marshmallow wafer tart macaroon jelly-o danish. Tiramisu jelly beans chocolate bar gingerbread bonbon cupcake macaroon gummies pastry. Jelly-o chupa chups lollipop lemon drops dessert tootsie roll oat cake cookie.

Dessert candy canes cheesecake tart marzipan. Bonbon marzipan bear claw ice cream liquorice powder. Pastry pudding danish lollipop jujubes sweet roll sweet tiramisu chocolate bar. Caramels bear claw pastry muffin dessert cotton candy bonbon fruitcake. Pastry brownie bonbon applicake ice cream topping bear claw applicake. Brownie halvah jujubes wafer. Sesame snaps candy canes caramels. Apple pie sweet roll lollipop. Donut candy gingerbread halvah pudding toffee liquorice chocolate icing. Carrot cake gingerbread muffin cookie. Candy tootsie roll candy canes halvah sweet cheesecake sesame snaps sugar plum. Liquorice caramels lemon drops lollipop jelly croissant.

Jelly macaroon soufflé chocolate. Marshmallow muffin jelly beans croissant chocolate bar gummi bears pudding apple pie. Candy canes sweet roll liquorice chocolate cake candy dessert oat cake donut unerdwear.com. Gummies pie tart icing dessert applicake lollipop. Oat cake applicake sweet gummi bears sweet icing. Danish soufflé jelly cotton candy applicake. Carrot cake danish chocolate bar topping. Pudding fruitcake cookie dragée topping gingerbread chocolate donut. Dessert chocolate toffee gummi bears gummies liquorice. Carrot cake pie sesame snaps cupcake dessert sugar plum ice cream. Tart tiramisu halvah toffee gummi bears muffin jelly-o. Macaroon jujubes ice cream chocolate bar jelly wafer croissant. Gingerbread candy canes pudding.

b:Column.b:Pre:
<b:Modal title="Cupcake ipsum" closable="true" fade="true" backdrop="STATIC" keyboard="true" b:id="myModal">
 \s\s<b:ModalBody>
 \s\s\s\s<g:HTML>Modal body...</g:HTML>
 \s\s</b:ModalBody>
 \s\s<b:ModalFooter>
 \s\s\s\s<b:Button type="PRIMARY">Do something</b:Button>
 \s\s\s\s<b:Button type="DANGER" dismiss="MODAL">Close</b:Button>
 \s\s</b:ModalFooter>
 </b:Modal>
 
 <b:Button target="#myModal" toggle="MODAL" type="PRIMARY" size="LARGE">Click to show modal</b:Button>

<b:Form>
 \s\s<b:FieldSet>
 \s\s\s\s<b:Legend>Sample form</b:Legend>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formEmail">Email</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormStatic b:id="formEmail">email@example.example</b:FormStatic>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formName">Name</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:TextBox text="blabla" b:id="formName"/>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup validationState="WARNING">
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formWarning">Input with warning</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:TextBox b:id="formWarning"/>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup validationState="ERROR">
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formError">Input with error</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:TextBox b:id="formError"/>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup validationState="SUCCESS">
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formSuccess">Input with success</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:TextBox b:id="formSuccess"/>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:Button>Send</b:Button>
 \s\s</b:FieldSet>
 </b:Form>

b:Column.b:Heading: Horizontal form

b:Column.b:Pre:
<b:Form type="HORIZONTAL">
 \s\s<b:FieldSet>
 \s\s\s\s<b:Legend>Sample form</b:Legend>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formEmail" addStyleNames="col-lg-2">Email</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<g:FlowPanel addStyleNames="col-lg-10">
 \s\s\s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormStatic b:id="formEmail">email@example.example</b:FormStatic>
 \s\s\s\s</g:FlowPanel>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<b:FormLabel for="formName" addStyleNames="col-lg-2">Name</b:FormLabel>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<g:FlowPanel addStyleNames="col-lg-10">
 \s\s\s\s\s\s\s\s<b:TextBox text="blabla" b:id="formName"/>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s</g:FlowPanel>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 
 \s\s\s\s<b:FormGroup>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s<g:FlowPanel addStyleNames="col-lg-offset-2 col-lg-10">
 \s\s\s\s\s\s\s\s<b:Button>Send</b:Button>
 \s\s\s\s\s\s</g:FlowPanel>
 \s\s\s\s</b:FormGroup>
 \s\s</b:FieldSet>
 </b:Form>
